amendment.description: To make available, from amounts appropriated for "Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Navy", $4,000,000 for Aviation Data Management and Control System, Block II.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3491 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3491 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Corzine. (consideration: CR S7367; text: CR S7367) To make available, from amounts appropriated for "Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Navy", $4,000,000 for Aviation Data Management and Control System, Block II.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3491 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3491 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Corzine.
